Reviews.Title: AW 110
Reviews.Author: Ellen F.
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift to my son and he seemed pleased with the results.  I have the original AW100 and have enjoyed it and love the dependability of the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 8 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX AW110 16 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS Function & Built-In Wi-Fi (Blue)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Deluxe Design Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket & Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Floating Foam Camera Strap - BONUS Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX AW110 16 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS & Built-In Wi-Fi (Blue) + 7pc Bundle 32GB Accessory Kit
